About the Company: eClerx Services Ltd provides data analytics and customized process solutions to global enterprise clients from their offshore delivery centers in India. The portfolio of services comprises of data analytics, operations management, data audits, metrics management and reporting services. They provide service solutions using a mix of custom designed data processes, delivery teams comprising generalists and domain specialists, and in-house software to automate processes. The company currently offers services to clients in the financial services, and retail and manufacturing industries.They offers their services in the United States, the United Kingdom, Europe, and Asia Pacific.
